question:
Consider the following statements about Cement Industry in India:
  1. India is the second largest cement producer and consumer in the world
  2. Maximum numbers of cement plants are located in South India
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: India is one of the world’s largest cement producers and consumers, second only to China. Second statement is also correct because maximum numbers of cement plants are located in Andhra Pradesh and other parts of South India.
